How much does working at a fast food restaurant pay per month?
In: Business › Careers&Employment
Rate This Answer
Most jobs are part time and have few educational requirements, attracting many young people to the occupation-21 percent of these workers were 16 to 19 years old in 2008, about six times the proportion for all workers. Answered
